name: Qui
description: Qui is a fast, modern web interface for qBittorrent with multi-instance support. Manage all your qBittorrent instances from a single, lightweight application. Features include cross-seeding, rule-based automations, scheduled backups with restore capabilities, and a transparent reverse proxy for external apps.
author: autobrr

form_fields.label: Session Secret
form_fields.hint: Secret key for cookie encryption. Auto-generated if left empty.

form_fields.label: Log Level
form_fields.hint: Logging level: ERROR, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, TRACE (default: INFO)
